title: Oh!
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Oh! par Daze
Close your eyes and lay down

Leave your fears away

Close your eyes

I’ll take you to another way

Take my hand it’s time to move

Boy set up your mind

I’ve build a brand new place

Just for you and I



I say now

Follow me cause you give me

This kind of things I can’t explain

Follow me and I’ll give you

All of my love to understand

Follow me cause you give me

This kind of things I need to understand


Follow me and I’ll give you

All of my love



Follow me cause you give me



Close your eyes and lay down

Feel my love for you

Close your eyes don’t be shy

Let’s start something new

Come around by my side

We’ll make it if we try

Fairy games have just begun

Between you and I



I say now

Follow me cause you give me

This kind of things I can’t explain

Follow me and I’ll give you


All of my love to understand

Follow me cause you give me

This kind of things I need to understand

Follow me and I’ll give you

All of my love



Follow me cause you give me

Follow me and I’ll give you

Follow me cause you give me

Follow me and I’ll give you

Follow me cause you give me

Follow me and I’ll give you

Follow me cause you give me

Follow me and I’ll give you
